thread.section_title: Enlightium Academy Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Enlightium Academy | enlightiumacademy.com
thread.title: Fargys Jones
thread.title_full: Enlightium Academy reviewed by Fargys Jones

author: Fargys Jones
title: Fargys Jones
text:
We are so glad with Enlightium Christian Academy! I love the program offered to my daughter is so easy to use and the classes are God centered. She is learning at her own pace. She is actually learning more than in public school, getting better grades and thoroughly enjoying school work. The teachers are wonderful, quick to respond and are very encouraging. It truly has been a blessing for my family. My daughter is so encouraged and I believe that It is well worth the money.
This is a great school and I highly recommend it!
